# WinTrim

> A cross-platform disk analyzer for Windows, macOS, and Linux. Free, open source, no telemetry.

## What is WinTrim?

WinTrim is a fast, visual disk space analyzer that helps you find and reclaim wasted storage. It features:

- **Lightning-fast scanning**: Scans 1TB+ drives in under 2 minutes
- **Interactive treemap visualization**: See exactly what's eating your disk space
- **Smart detection**: Automatically identifies games, developer tools, and caches
- **Cross-platform**: Native performance on Windows, macOS, and Linux via Avalonia UI
- **Privacy-first**: Zero telemetry, no data collection, fully offline

## Key Features

### File Categories
Automatic classification of files into categories: Video, Image, Audio, Code, Documents, Archives, Executables, and Other.

### Game Detection
Detects installed games from Steam, Epic Games, GOG, Origin, Battle.net, and standalone installations. Shows game size and last played date.

### Developer Tools Detection
Finds development caches that can be safely cleaned:
- Xcode DerivedData
- npm/node_modules
- CocoaPods cache
- NuGet packages
- Gradle cache
- Maven repository
- Cargo target folders
- Python virtual environments

### Quick Cleanup
One-click cleanup of safe-to-delete files with size preview and undo protection.

## Technical Details

- Built with .NET 8 and Avalonia UI 11.2
- MIT licensed open source
- GitHub: https://github.com/mobius29er/winTrim
- Website: https://wintrim.io

## Pricing

- **GitHub**: Free forever (MIT license)
- **Mac App Store**: $4.99 (coming soon)
- **Microsoft Store**: $4.99 (coming soon)

## Contact

- GitHub Issues: https://github.com/mobius29er/winTrim/issues
- Developer: Foxxception

## Comparison to Alternatives

WinTrim combines the speed of WizTree, the cross-platform support of ncdu, the visual appeal of DaisyDisk, and adds smart game/dev tool detection that no other tool offers.

| Feature | WinTrim | WinDirStat | TreeSize | DaisyDisk | WizTree |
|---------|---------|------------|----------|-----------|---------|
| Cross-platform | ✅ | ❌ | ❌ | ❌ | ❌ |
| Game detection | ✅ | ❌ | ❌ | ❌ | ❌ |
| Dev tools detection | ✅ | ❌ | ❌ | ❌ | ❌ |
| Open source | ✅ | ✅ | ❌ | ❌ | ❌ |
| Fast scanning | ✅ | ❌ | ✅ | ✅ | ✅ |
| Treemap view | ✅ | ✅ | ✅ | ❌ | ✅ |
